name: Idea Room | Itch.io Fighters Battle Royal
name_original: Idea Room | Itch.io Fighters Battle Royal
description:
Collected 7 Fighting Characters from different artist here on Itch.io. These Characters battle each other out over and over.

Each selected asset has Run, 2 Attack, Hurt and Death animation. (some are modified)

Every character has varying HP,  attacking interval for both attack animations, damage for both attack, and a movement speed.

Fight balance is unchecked.

Thank you for having fun!

(Asset Name == Artist)
(Hashashin) Elemental Wind -chierit.itch.io
Evil Wizard 2 - luizmelo.itch.io
Warrior V1.3 - clembod.itch.io
Hero Knight - sventhole.itch.io
Minotaur - elthen.itch.io
Old Guardian - eddies-workshop.itch.io
Axe demon - sanctumpixel.itch.io

*Idea Room is a collection of small, non-production games where we focus on exploring and experimenting ideas from mechanics, development architecture to graphics*
